name: Blue Harbour Group, L.P.
description: Blue Harbour Group, L.P. is an investment management firm that specializes in public equity investments. Founded in 2004, the firm is based in New York and focuses on a value-oriented investment strategy, primarily investing in small to mid-cap companies that exhibit strong fundamentals and compelling growth prospects. Blue Harbour seeks to engage with management teams to unlock shareholder value through operational improvements and strategic initiatives. The firm is known for its disciplined approach to investing, relying on rigorous fundamental analysis and a deep understanding of the businesses in which it invests. With a commitment to transparency and accountability, Blue Harbour aims to generate superior returns for its investors by uncovering undervalued opportunities in the market and fostering long-term relationships with portfolio companies. Additionally, the firm actively participates in corporate governance to ensure that the interests of shareholders are aligned with those of management.
